duties_responsibilities.duty: Weld and fabricate massive steel structures such as large steel girders, beams, and nodes for skyscrapers and large power generation equipment.
Perform 3 position/1g, 2g, & 3g weld tests on ½” thick carbon steel plates using .045" 70 Series flux cored wire.
Obtain and maintain industry certifications, including NCCER and OSHA 10.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma / GED required. NCCER and OSHA 10 certifications preferred.
